q: Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed," Eric Schmidt wrote on his Twitter feed after the announcement. Now, Eric Schmidt said he will focus on deals, business relationships and working with governments, and still act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . Strong results The move comes as Google posted a 29% jump in profit and revenue for the fourth quarter. Net income was Â£ 2.54 billion, while revenue was Â£ 8.4 billion.

some concern that the two new superstar judges might distract from the promised return to a focus on the contestants. "My biggest hope is that "Idol' finds one-of-a-kind talent this season," Jim Cantiello said. Ellen DeGeneres proved that a big star on the judges' panel does not necessarily ensure a must-see` Idol.' The show lives and dies by the contestants it highlights. If they don't find the most compelling, the most interesting and the most talented group of singers, the show is going to be as culturally relevant as` Skating With the Celebrities.' The paper says that the ongoing legal, journalistic and parliamentary investigations into phone hacking at the News of the World will continue to raise questions about David Cameron 's judgment. There will be people hoping that Andy Coulson 's departure will be an end to the matter, but of course it isn't. There are too many unanswered questions about too many important people, companies and institutions...[ This] suggests that David Cameron 's lack of judgment over Andy Coulson is even more striking. uncomfortable questions remain for the prime minister.
